audioText: L'agent immobilier honnête posera ses documents sur la table lors de notre rendez-vous pour visiter l'appartement extrême.
question: When will the real estate agent place the documents on the table?
options: During our appointment to visit the extreme apartment
Before the building inspection takes place
When the previous tenants move out completely
explanation: The text states 'L'agent immobilier honnête posera ses documents sur la table lors de notre rendez-vous pour visiter l'appartement extrême' - The honest real estate agent will place his documents on the table during our appointment to visit the extreme apartment. 'Posera' is the future tense of 'poser'.
